name: NYDailyNews
text:
A Hartford, Conn., detective in his department’s major crimes unit was suspended after inviting fellow officers to wager on where their city’s first murder of 2021 will occur.
https://t.co/Pj3gpsJNnT

name: NYDailyNews
text:
American Airlines is becoming the first major carrier to sell an at-home COVID-19 test kit that passengers can order and return via UPS before flights to domestic destinations, it said.
https://t.co/zfPD8jwuh2

name: NYDailyNews
text:
A homicide victim whose decomposing body was found in a desolate Bronx alleyway over the summer had disappeared from her home and reported missing by her family, nearly a year earlier, police said.
https://t.co/zvdcczFG0c

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Radiators are cranked up to full-blast in city classrooms relying on open windows for ventilation.

That’s cold comfort for kids and teachers still struggling through frigid lessons as winter arrives.
https://t.co/VLDEvqAZ15

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Trump sought to claim credit for the likely imminent approval of the first American coronavirus vaccines.

He painted a factually dubious picture of his administration’s response to the still-raging pandemic.
https://t.co/hUrF2eD8tt

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Two Richmond, Virginia, police officers were indicted for two more charges of assault and battery stemming from their actions during May protests against racism and police brutality.
https://t.co/rktAvEnvUz

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Four lions have tested positive for coronavirus at a Barcelona zoo, most likely infected by an asymptomatic staffer, zoo officials said.
https://t.co/9u6qa9wCPh

name: NYDailyNews
text:
A Brooklyn pol resurrects a proposed online deliveries tax to help the MTA’s finances — a year-old idea that’s now won a thumbs-up from a union bigwig.
https://t.co/84XZcAP6YM
